0.text: Innate: Nautilus'  basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 110 (based on level) bonus physical damage and  root the target for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.
0.html: Innate: Nautilus' basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 110 (based on level) bonus physical damage and root the target for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.

1.text: 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level)
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
1.html: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

1.text: WIDTH:  180 /  0

0.text: Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor in the target direction that stops on the first enemy or terrain hit. If the anchor hits an enemy, it deals magic damage and  reveals them,  dragging them toward Nautilus while he also  dashes toward them within 0.9 seconds. Afterwards, the target is  rooted for 0.1 seconds.
0.html:
Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor in the target direction that stops on the first enemy or terrain hit.
If the anchor hits an enemy, it deals magic damage and reveals them, dragging them toward Nautilus while he also dashes toward them within 0.9 seconds. Afterwards, the target is rooted for 0.1 seconds.

1.text: If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus  dashes to that location and 50% of Dredge Line's  cooldown and  mana cost are refunded.
1.html: If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus dashes to that location and 50% of Dredge Line's  cooldown and  mana cost are refunded.

2.text: Nautilus is  unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight. He can cast  Titan's Wrath and  Riptide during the dash.
2.html: Nautilus is unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight. He can cast Titan's Wrath and Riptide during the dash.

1.text: CAST TIME: NONE

0.text: Active: Nautilus  shields himself for up to 6 seconds. While the shield holds, his basic attacks are empowered to apply Pain of Wrath to the target and surrounding enemies.
0.html: Active: Nautilus shields himself for up to 6 seconds. While the shield holds, his basic attacks are empowered to apply Pain of Wrath to the target and surrounding enemies.

1.text: Pain of Wrath: The target suffers magic damage over time, half dealt immediately and the other half dealt after 1.25 seconds.
1.html: Pain of Wrath: The target suffers magic damage over time, half dealt immediately and the other half dealt after 1.25 seconds.

2.text: Titan's Wrath  resets Nautilus'  basic attack timer.
2.html: Titan's Wrath resets Nautilus' basic attack timer.

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

0.text: Active: Nautilus sends three waves of explosions that radiate from him over 0.561 seconds, each dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds. Riptide deals 150% damage against  monsters.
0.html: Active: Nautilus sends three waves of explosions that radiate from him over 0.561 seconds, each dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds. Riptide deals 150% damage against monsters.

1.text: Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt 50% damage.
1.html: Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt 50% damage.

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  225 / 300 / 750

0.text: Active: Nautilus sends out a  Depth Charge that chases the target enemy  champion, accelerating over time and creating eruptions every 0.264 seconds in its wake that also briefly grant  sight of the area. Enemies hit by the eruptions are dealt magic damage,  knocked up for 1 second, and  stunned for a duration.
0.html: Active: Nautilus sends out a Depth Charge that chases the target enemy champion, accelerating over time and creating eruptions every 0.264 seconds in its wake that also briefly grant sight of the area. Enemies hit by the eruptions are dealt magic damage, knocked up for 1 second, and stunned for a duration.

1.text: Upon reaching the primary target or when it moves too far away, the Depth Charge erupts a final time. The primary target takes increased damage, is  stunned for the same duration, and  knocked up for a modified duration.
1.html: Upon reaching the primary target or when it moves too far away, the Depth Charge erupts a final time. The primary target takes increased damage, is stunned for the same duration, and knocked up for a modified duration.

0.text: Innate: Nautilus'  basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 110 (based on level) bonus physical damage and  root the target for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.
0.html: Innate: Nautilus' basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 110 (based on level) bonus physical damage and root the target for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Devotion: Grant allied champions within 850 radius a shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – DEVOTION: Grant allied champions within  850 radius a  shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Consecrate: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+250 health
+250 mana
+35 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+200% base health regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Nautilus  shields himself for up to 6 seconds. While the shield holds, his basic attacks apply Pain of Wrath to the target and surrounding enemies.

Active: Nautilus sends three waves of explosions that radiate from him over 0.561 seconds, each dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  slowing them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds. Riptide deals 150% damage against  monsters.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Nautilus sends out a  Depth Charge that chases the target enemy  champion, accelerating over time and creating eruptions every 0.264 seconds in its wake that also briefly grant  sight of the area. Enemies hit by the eruptions are dealt magic damage,  knocked up for 1 second, and  stunned for a duration.

Upon reaching the primary target or when it moves too far away, the Depth Charge erupts a final time. The primary target takes increased damage, is  stunned for the same duration, and  knocked up for a modified duration.
